title: Priyanka Chopra gives a badass reply after Donald Trump becomes the new President elect of US ‚Äì watch video
text:
Dabboo Ratnani 2017 calendar: The photographer opens up about clicking Priyanka, Hrithik and Shraddha 
Priyanka Chopra won People‚Äôs Choice awards two years in a row. She won this award for her performance in Quantico. It all happened when she landed at the LA airport to attend the event, one of the paparazzi asked her about the much talked about topic of Donald Trump as the new President elect of US. The reporter asked, ‚ÄúWhat are your thoughts on our new president-elect Donald trump, he‚Äôs gonna be in office pretty soon, kinda scary?‚Äù. To which Priyanka Chopra in her usual classy self replied, ‚ÄúI am an Indian so‚Ä¶are you scared?‚Äù. Reporter then replied, ‚ÄúNo I am not, but it seems like a lot of foreigners are‚Äù. 
Well, looks like Priyanka Chopra has made it clear that she is not scared of Donal Trump as she is an Indian and Indians are not scared of anyone. In fact, when the reporter replied that ‚Äúlot of foreigners are‚Äù, she did not pay attention to it and was busy signing autographs for her fans there. Also read: Priyanka Chopra on winning her second People‚Äôs Choice Award: Can I wiggle a little? ‚Äì check out her FULL speech 
Check out the video below: Paparazzi : What are you thoughts on our new president elect Donald trump, kinda scary? 
Priyanka : I‚Äôm Indian, are you scared? pic.twitter.com/xkvxkGM8QX 
‚Äî üçÉaly (@IAlyazya_) January 18, 2017 
Priyanka Chopra, after winning her second People‚Äôs choice award said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm really happy being a drama queen and this is how its done. Thank you to the people, like everyone has been saying, this has been an incredible journey. Every single woman that was nominated with me today, all these incredible actresses were the reason I joined television. They were the reason that I wanted to be the actor that I am here today, receiving this award and being in the same category as them. It‚Äôs just so overwhelming. Thank you to all of you who have accepted me and loved my show. I‚Äôm just really psyched. Can I like do a little wiggle? I‚Äôm sorry. It‚Äôs the concussion talking but thank you so much and it means the world to me.‚Äù
